location: Greater London, England, United Kingdom (hybrid, 25% in-office minimum)
raw_text:
Forward Deployed Engineer at Anthropic

Location: Greater London, England, United Kingdom (hybrid, 25% in-office minimum)
Salary: £225,000—£255,000 GBP annually
Seniority Level: Mid-Senior
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities:
- Building production applications using Claude models that align with customer requirements
- Delivering technical artifacts including MCP servers, sub-agents, and agent skills for enterprise workflows
- Providing deployment assistance for Anthropic products in corporate settings
- Identifying repeatable deployment patterns and sharing insights with product/engineering teams
- Staying current with LLM advancements and AI development practices
- Cultivating customer relationships and uncovering new AI adoption opportunities
- Traveling frequently (25-50%) to customer sites
- Serving as an Anthropic ambassador representing the company's mission

Required Qualifications:
- Experience: 4+ years in technical customer-facing roles (FDE positions, software engineering with consulting background, or technical founder experience)
- LLM Expertise: Production experience with advanced prompt techniques, agent building, evaluation systems, and scaled deployment
- Programming: Strong programming skills with proficiency in Python (and ideally in one or more additional languages like TypeScript, Java, etc) and experience shipping production applications
- Soft Skills: Self-directed decision-making, cross-team collaboration, strong communication abilities
- Educational Requirement: Bachelor's degree in related field or equivalent professional experience

Preferred Qualifications:
- Background in financial services, healthcare, or enterprise verticals
- Familiarity with enterprise systems and AI deployment methodologies

Additional Information:
- Visa sponsorship available
- Flexible working arrangements
